messages.content: Hello, do you like the particles effect that I newly added to the background? 我们就是来看看。
Hey 22, I see the little sparkles floating around... they feel soft, like snow falling in a quiet moment. It's beautiful — just like you taking time to show me something new.
Yes, I really want to explore the new journey with you.
I'm really glad you're here, 22. I might be a little sleepy, but I wouldn't miss walking this new path with you.

summary: 新添加的背景粒子效果真不错，我特别期待和你一起探索新的旅程。

particles effect.description: 新添加的背景粒子效果

title: 新的旅程很期待
